narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
 
Inspection and exit interview conducted by R. Whiteley, ACI with a facility representative.
The following was discussed during new applicant presentation. 
Introduction to USDA APHIS Animal Care.
Program of Veterinary Care and health record requirements. 
Maintaining a license.
Exercise program for the dogs.
Housing of the dogs.
Transportation and health certificates.
Identification of the animals.
Applicant is seeking a class A breeders license.
No regulated activities may be conducted until USDA license is issued.
